channel.title: Hiscores issue?
channel.description:
Hey I tried adding hiscores using Deathchaos9's tutorial, and everything is smooth, except when I add the stuff to my run and logout method, I get this when I run my server.
[IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/j0ljrk.jpg[/img]
When I compile it's fine, just this.
Suggestions?

item.title: Hiscores issue?
item.dc:creator: @Saphire1 Saphire`
item.description:
@Saphire1 wrote:

You need the jdbc file in your server files. You are connecting through SQL now, and Java couldn’t find the plugin.

Read full topic
